short.am,ar,bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,: Assassination Classroom wallpaper turn new tab to Assassination Classroom background. Assassination Classroom theme for fans.

short.fi: Assassination Classroom laajennus vaihtaa uuden välilehden Assassination Classroom taustakuvan HD-taustalla.

short.ja: 暗殺教室の壁紙拡張機能は、暗殺教室の壁紙HD背景で新しいタブページを変更します。暗殺教室のためのテーマ。

short.pl: Rozszerzenie Klasa zabójstw zmienia nową kartę z tapetą Klasa zabójstw HD. Motywy dla fanów Klasa zabójstw Anime.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: A extensão Assassination Classroom Anime muda a nova guia com o fundo HD do papel de parede Assassination Classroom.
short.sv: Mord klassrum förlängning ändra ny flik med Mord klassrum tapeter HD bakgrund. Teman för Mord klassrum fans.
short.zh_CN: 暗杀教室壁纸扩展程序重新定义了您的Chrome新标签页成为暗杀教室的背景壁纸。暗杀教室粉丝的主题。
short.zh_TW: 暗殺教室壁紙擴展程序重新定義了您的Chrome新標籤頁成為暗殺教室的背景壁紙。暗殺教室粉絲的主題。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Assassination Classroom wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Assassination Classroom background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Choose search bar using Google, Bing, Yahoo or DuckDuckGo in settings.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Assassination Classroom new tab.
